items.content_html: Lead Tracker is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension designed to help you track and manage leads effortlessly. Perfect for sales teams, freelancers, and entrepreneurs, this tool allows you to capture, organize, and revisit potential clients or contacts right from your browser.

Perfect for sales teams, freelancers, and entrepreneurs, this tool allows you to capture, organize, and revisit potential clients or contacts right from your browser.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable data table component for displaying and managing tabular data. Features include sorting, filtering, pagination, and responsive design. Easily integrate into any project and apply custom styling. Available for download via npm for cloud deployment.
items.title: WilliamSilvaOliveiraa/nalu-table-component: A lightweight, customizable data table component for displaying and managing tabular data. Features include sorting, filtering, pagination, and responsive design. Easily integrate into any project and apply custom styling. Available for download via npm for cloud deployment.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
